name: ⭐️Large 3Bdrm Suite HBO TV WIFI ✅by Lake & Village

description:
Steps from the village shops and across the street from the lake, this unit is the perfect place to crash for families or a group of friends. This 3 bedroom unit is setup almost like a suite in a hotel. It has two dedicated parking spaces next to your own entrance. You get 1-3 bedrooms (see below) and 1 bathroom. They all have locking doors and open to a common living area with huge sofa, dining table and chairs, kitchenette, and Cable Smart TV with HBO and Netflix Ready.

The space
This unit is part of our commercial lodge / retreat center. (Big Bear Group Vacation Rentals) Hosting since 2007

This single level 3 Bedroom suite features a large living area with sofa, flatscreen (Smart Cable TV, HBO, Netflix ready), kitchenette, dining table and chairs. The village is just a 1 minute walk to shopping and dining and you can stroll around 2 lakeside parks within half a block. Perfect for 1-3 couples, a family or group of friends.

You have 2 dedicated parking spots next to the entrance.
There is plenty of overflow parking on the street or nearby. We can always find you a place to park.
This unit is part of a duplex and there is another unit above separated by a locked door in a stairway. Considerate noise levels required.
Both units can be rented together for large family gatherings.

Note: Included bedrooms depends on how many guests are on your reservation.
1-3 guests on reservation = 1 bedroom included
4-6 guests on reservation = 2 bedrooms included
7+ guests on reservation = 3 bedrooms included
If you would like to request an exception, please message us.

Bedroom 1 has a single over double bunk bed, Cable Smart TV, HBO, Hdmi port. (Sleeps 1-3)
Bedroom 2 has a queen bed and 2 bunk beds (3 twin beds and 1 full size double bottom bunk.) Sleeps 2-6
Bedroom 3 is a bunk room with 5 twin beds and 1 full size double bottom bunk. (Sleeps 2-6)

Bedrooms 2, 3 and bathroom require a step up into the room. The rest of the unit is level with the parking spaces outside.

If you don't rent all bedrooms, the other bedroom(s) are just locked during your stay so we don't have to clean them. In any case, the unit is 100% for you and your guests only. You never share indoor spaces with other guests.

The living room has a large flatscreen cable TV, sofa, kitchenette, dining table. Extra folding chairs available in unit.
2 parking spaces directly outside the unit door, and extra parking is available on street.

Bedrooms have their own locking doors off the living area.
The bathroom is accessed from the central living room area.
Towels, and soap are provided.
There is no cleaning service available during your stay.
No laundry in unit. Laundromat available right around the corner.

Kitchenette:
Sink, soap, sponge, microwave, 2 mini refrigerators
5 each of: bowls, plates, mugs, and place settings are provided.
We wash all of these between guests and leave them in the cupboard clean for you at arrival. Please scrape food scraps off everything and leave everything in the sink or provided tub for us wash. This way we ensure everything is clean for the next guests.
There is a gas BBQ right outside all ready to go.

There are also 15+ wonderful restaurants a block away in the village for take out and many are open for outdoor dining during pandemic.

Ask about long term rates. Price and availability varies greatly depending on season.

Pricing changes with number of guests. Extra guests are not free. Please make sure you are searching with the correct number of guests to see correct pricing.

EV Charging
Free charging for our guests (w/Minimum $100 Paid Reservation)
$25 cash flat rate otherwise.
MUST BRING YOUR OWN NEMA 14-50 adapter plug charging system.

Other things to note
Whoever makes the reservation must be present at check in and provide a valid ID.
$200 refundable security deposit due before arrival. To be paid via Airbnb or Credit Card.

Cancel Policy:
Free cancellation for 48 hours, if at least 14 days before check-in.
After that, guests can cancel up to 7 days before check-in and get a 50% refund of the nightly rate, and the cleaning fee, but not the service fee. If the guest cancels less than 7 days in advance or decides to leave early after check-in, the nights not spent are not refunded.
